title: Reverse Reading Strategy: Sequential Learning Design for Reading Comprehension Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental reading comprehension skills and understanding of basic literary structures
context.additional_context: Curriculum for in-service professionals presupposing smartphone-based learning. Operated with summative assessment focus

learning_goals: Learners can analyze relationships between detailed elements of a work (characters, settings, events) with 80% accuracy through three or more reverse-reading practice sessions.
Learners will enhance their ability to distinguish between main and supporting themes in texts using a backward design analysis framework by the second week.
Learners will demonstrate the effectiveness of backward reading strategies by achieving a score of 10 or above out of 15 in the final assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
